About.hello: Hello, my name is Luís Renato Toniati!
About.description: I am a Fullstack developer, passionate about technology and its benefits to society. I am 22 years old and I have a degree in Systems Analysis and Development. I am looking for a new challenge aiming to acquire more knowledge, experiences, and professional growth. I have a great interest in software development, especially in web technologies. Besides front-end development, where I have the most proficiency, I have extensive knowledge in SQL, having learned and worked with databases before any programming language.

experience1.title: Electronic Assembler - IBRAMED Brazil
experience1.description: Perform inspection, soldering, and assembly of electronic boards in equipment, assemble electronic equipment in production lines and cells, assist the team in implementing improvements during the production process.

experience2.title: Electronic Technical Assistant - IBRAMED Brazil
experience2.description: Calibrate electronic boards and equipment, repair and replace damaged electronic components in equipment, record and respond to equipment and board defects in the manufacturing system, recommending corrective, preventive actions and improvements in test devices.

experience3.title: IT Technician - Infoluck Systems
experience3.description: Support customers using the system, maintenance of printers, general infrastructure, Windows, database, training, report creation, server maintenance.

experience4.title: Web Developer - Infoluck Systems
experience4.description: Design and develop the front-end of applications using Figma, React, TypeScript, among other technologies. Maintain legacy applications that use PHP, JQuery, HTML, CSS, JavaScript. Modify reports using PL/SQL.
